title: Black Screen in New Client, Old Client is Fine
body: The new client, after finishing the "L" logo with the spinning on start-up, just turns into a black screen. Pressing on the cog results in a blank menu, so I can't repair it either. The old client is fine though.

replies.body: This black screen can happen if your network is failing to reach a service and download assets.   Your connection is probably fine on the legacy version, but the updated client is an intended application that could need some tweaking.  My suggestion would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix up that black screen.  Let me know if you have any questions!
It didn't seem to work for me. I ran the repair tool (although I don't know how to run it as an admin, it's not displaying that offer). How can I share the logs with you?

You can run the HRT as Admin by right-click + Run as Admin from the directory (not the shortcut).  This is usually located in C:\Program Files (x86)\Hextech Repair Tool\ 

Logs that you gather through the HRT should be saved on a folder to your desktop.  Attach those to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will help figure this out with you.  We'll see you there!
